statements: SELECT * FROM WasteComposition WHERE id = 1;
SELECT waste_type, waste_quantity FROM WasteComposition WHERE waste_quantity > 100;
SELECT landfill_expansion_project FROM WasteComposition WHERE landfill_capacity < 500;
SELECT waste_type, landfill_expansion_project FROM WasteComposition WHERE waste_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM WasteComposition WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Plastic%';
SELECT id, waste_type, waste_quantity FROM WasteComposition WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND waste_quantity > 100
SELECT waste_type, landfill_capacity FROM WasteComposition WHERE landfill_expansion_project = 'Project A' ORDER BY landfill_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM WasteComposition WHERE landfill_expansion_project IS NOT NULL AND waste_quantity < landfill_capacity
SELECT id, waste_type, landfill_expansion_project FROM WasteComposition WHERE waste_quantity < landfill_capacity AND landfill_expansion_project LIKE '%Expansion%'

SELECT id, waste_type, landfill_capacity, landfill_expansion_project FROM WasteComposition WHERE waste_quantity < landfill_capacity AND (landfill_expansion_project LIKE '%Expansion%' OR landfill_expansion_project LIKE '%Project%') ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_composition;
SELECT waste_type, waste_weight FROM waste_composition WHERE waste_weight > 100;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM waste_composition ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_capacity WHERE expansion_plans = TRUE;
SELECT landfill_location, current_capacity FROM landfill_capacity WHERE current_capacity < 5000;
SELECT * FROM waste_composition WHERE waste_id = 1
SELECT waste_type, waste_weight FROM waste_composition ORDER BY waste_weight DESC
SELECT MAX(waste_weight) AS max_weight, MIN(waste_weight) AS min_weight FROM waste_composition
SELECT * FROM landfill_capacity WHERE expansion_plans = true
SELECT landfill_location, current_capacity FROM landfill_capacity WHERE current_capacity > 500
SELECT * FROM waste_composition;
SELECT waste_type, composition_percent FROM waste_composition ORDER BY composition_percent DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, estimated_completion_date FROM expansion_projects;
SELECT max_capacity, current_fill_level, landfill_area FROM landfill_capacity WHERE current_fill_level < max_capacity;
SELECT project_name, estimated_completion_date FROM expansion_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_composition WHERE composition_percent > 0.5 ORDER BY composition_percent DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type FROM waste_composition WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Plastic%' ORDER BY waste_type ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, estimated_completion_date FROM expansion_projects WHERE estimated_completion_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2025-01-01';
SELECT * FROM landfill_capacity WHERE current_fill_level < max_capacity ORDER BY current_fill_level ASC;
SELECT id, landfill_area FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_area > 100 AND current_fill_level < max_capacity ORDER BY landfill_area DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteComposition ORDER BY waste_type DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM LandfillCapacity WHERE capacity_tons > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ExpansionProjects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, waste_type, quantity_tons, date_recorded FROM HistoricalData WHERE quantity_tons BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM WasteComposition WHERE composition_percentage > 0.5 ORDER BY composition_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteComposition WHERE composition_percentage > 50;
SELECT id, waste_type FROM WasteComposition WHERE composition_percentage < 30 ORDER BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM LandfillCapacity WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND capacity_tons > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ExpansionProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT waste_type, quantity_tons, date_recorded FROM HistoricalData WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM expansion_projects;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT waste_type, compostable FROM waste_composition WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT landfill_id, capacity FROM landfill_capacity ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM expansion_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, compostable, recyclable FROM waste_composition WHERE compostable = TRUE AND recyclable = FALSE;
SELECT id, landfill_id, prediction_date, waste_type, prediction_amount FROM forecasting_data WHERE landfill_id = 5 AND prediction_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT * FROM landfill_capacity INNER JOIN waste_composition ON landfill_capacity.landfill_id = waste_composition.id ORDER BY capacity DESC;
